synopsis.text: It was the dawn of summer break when a tender-hearted young girl, fresh from elementary school, brought home a cherry tomato plant she had nurtured with great affection. As she embarked on this new journey with her beloved plant, the promise of joyous days lay ahead. This heartwarming tale marked the directorial debut of Shiori Mizutani, an independent animation released in April 2015. Will the girl and her cherry tomatoes find their happily ever after? Only time will tell.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
